name: Emery Gaiser
bio:
GAISER In memory of Adam Gaiser
died Aug. 29, 1894 aged 71 yrs. 10 mos. 13 dys.
Magdalena his wife
1828-1919

1852-1923

1908-1947
wife of Royal Gaiser
1905-1961
thier infant daughter Jean A. 1928
aged 2 years old
Lila Pym
1903-1990
wife of Emery Gaiser
1899-1991
